thread.title: Your embarrassing old Facebook posts are now much easier to find

title: Your embarrassing old Facebook posts are now much easier to find
text:
Your embarrassing old Facebook posts are now much easier to find 
The Telegraph Friday 23rd October, 2015 
a major update to its search feature , indexing the social network's 2 trillion posts in a way that makes it much easier to dig out your friends' old status updates....
